response.overview: You're stranded in the Australian outback, hundreds of miles from civilization, who is qualified to save you? We'll show you everything you need to survive Down Under on a walkabout with the brightest and most beautiful Australian women. First meet Lucy, This natural-born beauty likes to explore the bold challenges of the mountains and deserted beaches of the island continent... in the buff. Then blaze a trail deep into the bush with Simone. This exotic wonder is a true-blue Aussie but her Thai Heritage lends her an exotic elegance that is out of this world. And don't miss sizzling profiles of Rachel, Coralie, Sara, and Petta as host Erika Heynatz reveals more natural and erotic wonders from Down Under.
response.title: The Girls Down Under
